org.drip.spline.params

Class SegmentDesignInelasticControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.spline.params.SegmentDesignInelasticControl

  • public class SegmentDesignInelasticControl
extends java.lang.Object
    SegmentDesignInelasticControl implements basis per-segment inelastic parameter set. It exports the following functionality: - Retrieve the Continuity Order. - Retrieve the Length Penalty and the Curvature Penalty Parameters. - Create the C2 Design Inelastic Parameters. - Create the Design Inelastic Parameters for the desired Ck Criterion and the Roughness Penalty Order.
